entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , La Prairie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:07 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, 3.3°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near plus 3.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clearing. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 1.
